job.title: Remote Application Support /Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Financial Services
job.description: <p><strong>What you have: </strong></p><ul><li>2-3+ years of systems and/or applications support in an enterprise environment.</li><li>Passion for learning, reliability, automation, orchestration and continual improvement.</li><li>Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent experience.</li><li>Firm current Linux and Windows Server Administration experience.</li><li>Strong verbal and written communication skills.</li><li>Experience supporting middleware infrastructure (IIS, Tomcat,Websphere, etc).</li><li>Experience with Enterprise batch scheduling tools is a plus.</li><li>Experience with Continuous Delivery/Integration, Infrastructure as Code, Splunk, AppDynamics and Salt Stack a plus.</li><li>Experience in Agile methodologies, Kanban, CI/CD, Definition of Done and use of Atlassian Tools, Confluence, and Jira.</li></ul>
